DPRK delegation leaves for Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK delegation leaves for Switzerland
     Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Jang Jae On, chairman of the central committee of the society, left here today to participate in the 12th general assembly of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the 27th conference of the International Committee of the Red Cross slated to be held in Switzerland.
